pageContent: Background: Resistance training (RT) improves muscular strength, physical functioning and quality of life in prostate cancer survivors, but the optimal frequency of RT is unknown. We conducted a pilot randomized controlled trial to compare the effects of 3 versus 2 days per week of RT in prostate cancer survivors diagnosed within the past 2 years.

metaData.source:
Locally advanced prostate cancer: the role of surgical management
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19664112/
